website_summaries.verdict: Classic twist-style mop by a top brand. Its no-frills design appeals to customers who need a simple cleaning tool.
pros: Sports a durable, reusable head that's made of real cotton and is machine washable
Simple to operate with a built-in wringer
cons: Mop head occasionally sheds strands of fibers

customer_reviews.title: Lied about the refills.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop and was excited to see it at this price with 3 extra refills. Well, I only received 1 refill and I am pissed. I will be contacting them and the 1 star will stand until I get me other 2 refills.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luke

customer_reviews.title: Sheds A LOT!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new wood floor. The mop shredded so much that as the floor dried, I had fiber everywhere. Going back to microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: mslala

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good mop!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a good mop for a while now and everything I kept buying either fell apart or I might as well have been mopping with just the stick. I had one of these mops a few years ago and loved it but when it finally got too nasty to use I couldn't find heads for it. I was so happy to find this deal WITH the extra heads. I have one of the fancy mop and vacuum units but with our old wood floors and uneven tile I will just stick with my Libman!!
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this type for years Very good mop the last one I had lasted for about 2-3 years Great quality it withheld bleach and other household chemicals
customer_reviews.author: RUTHIE

customer_reviews.title: No Pain, Much Gain !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop because it takes pressure off my back. However the mop head is easily dislodged and this was the only reason that kept me from giving 5 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Bookcritic4readers

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The fiber on the mop head was very disapointing, especially after so many good reviews. So many part of my mop head was just holding on by a thin thread (ita suppose to have multiple strands that twist in one large strand). The when i tried mopping the mop head would just bunch up into a ball. Not satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I will have mop for a while. it is very light weight and it clean the floor good and is easy to clean after use
customer_reviews.author: Milie G

customer_reviews.title: Very  convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this mop. Just purchased 2 more. One is for his mom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Star

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop has changed my life. After wasting money on swiffer wet mop pads and expensive steam mops, it turns out the easiest and most effective thing to use is just a plain old mop. I love the self ringing head. The heads are incredibly durable, professional quality and the mop is very easy to assemble/disassemble and throw the mop head in the wash after every use with towels. This mop plus some hot water with Dawn dish soap makes cleaning the house a dream.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain & Price
customer_reviews.text: This mop is far superior to others I've used in the past. I love this brand and the ease of use. Not too light and not too heavy, and hands stay clean when wringing it out. Now there's a plus from the old fashioned ones. Nice to have received the 3 additional mop heads as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl LaFond

customer_reviews.title: The worst mop I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I despise moping in the 1st place, but this mop delivered a new level of dislike. The strings are short. The strings are sparsely distributed. Literally the worst mop I've ever owned. Literally.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Tornado mop works great. Very sturdy and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McGlone

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mops I've ever owned. Easy to wring out excess water. Great floor coverage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PennStateAlum

customer_reviews.title: Best mop we've used!
customer_reviews.text: This mop cleans so well. And it's such a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest, worst quality mops I’ve ever bought! They are one huge ball of lint! Could not mop the floor due to how bad they shed! DO NOT BUY!! Even laundered them to get rid of lint and that just shredded! So so poor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie C

customer_reviews.title: It leaves cotton behind
customer_reviews.text: Too bad I took my time in using this product because I can no longer return it. It leaves behind too much cotton I have to sweep again when I finish moping.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Best bundle deal you can’t beat it ! I’ve always used limban products ! I recommend !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite mop!! This is such a great value with 3 extra mop heads. Very easy to use and wring out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products and a good package deal !!!
customer_reviews.text: Loves myself a Lidman mop !!! 3 refills !!! I'll be a moping fool for a long time !!! Thanks for the value pack
customer_reviews.author: Jay Adams

customer_reviews.title: Mop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to ring out durable Absorbent Extra three refills is very convenient
customer_reviews.author: pat demma

customer_reviews.title: Wrong purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but hard to clean and as usual cloth holds an order.
customer_reviews.author: Samwithoutlimit

customer_reviews.title: Mopping good!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is great! Long lasting and sturdy! I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: RachelK1983

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great mop - only kind of mop iv ever used and great value
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Stauber

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I can wash them when I'm finished. It saves me a few good hard earned dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Bent out of box!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t use it due to it being bent right out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Trena

customer_reviews.title: Good mop, works well for home kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I like it even though it's not something you want to use, rather a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Tony DeVoto

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Products work great as B long as You do your part and wash often.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I tried a lot of Mops and keep coming back to this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: bought one boasted about it at work now they buy them
customer_reviews.author: patricia rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: They came one time. I love these mops. They're so absorbent. And easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: drucilla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mop kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mop works great and easy for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Mops up the competition!
customer_reviews.text: I have used sponge mops forever but needed a new one after a move. My friend, who's a professional cleaner, raved about this mop. I was skeptical about whether it would just push dog hair around my floors, but was willing to give it a try. So glad I did! It cleans really well, has held up better than sponges, and I don't have to bend over as far each time I wring it out. Pro tip: Be sure to vigorously shake a new mop head outside for several mins before first use to get rid of some of the loose lint.
customer_reviews.author: Skyebyrd

customer_reviews.title: Plastic broken after few mops
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke after a month the plastic piece that rings the mop out snaps off easily. Thanks for cutting corners now I need another more reliable mop.
customer_reviews.author: GreggJaden

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm, what's there to say about a mop
customer_reviews.text: It comes without a person to use it, so that has to be me. My least liked task. It's not as easy to use nor does it work as well as the old fashioned mops that are now impossible to find. But my floors need mopping so... I do.
customer_reviews.author: digtheisland

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE A WATE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Does not absorb anything. Tried to get the mop of and the whole thing broke, a bunch of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta S. Litke

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Fuzzy Lint
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and were a lot of small fuzzy lints across the floor after moping. Quality of the mop head isn't too great.
customer_reviews.author: PainInDaBoot

customer_reviews.title: Great mop, with improved design
customer_reviews.text: I really like this style of mop, but the other mop that I got had a different mop attachment mechanism. This new attachment method looks like it is much more sturdy and should last a lot longer. I also really like that it comes with 3 replacement mop heads!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kramer

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd tone buying this mop.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I had to replace my old one. The metal rusted and would no longer hold the mop head. I do recommend this product. Just don't leave it in the bucket with water.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best rag mop on the market
customer_reviews.text: Only mop brand I buy to clean my home with. This is an excellent purchase and deal. I will be back! Highly recommend and hope they never raise the prices or go out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: PrettynPinkboots

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: My housekeeper insists on this brand and model. He heard that it's being discontinued, so I stocked up. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Reeva

customer_reviews.title: Best mistake I ever made
customer_reviews.text: As i stated in the preview of the mop heads i bought them by accident so then I bought the mop and i love the mop! It is easy to use and absorbent. Only thing that is a hiccup is changing heads is a bit rough but once I you tubed that it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will do the job. Waiting on the house cleaning lady to try it! ha!
customer_reviews.author: Willee

customer_reviews.title: Leaves marks
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the great reviews. This mop leaves marks on my floor. Not streaks! Actual scuff marks. It makes 10 times the work.
customer_reviews.author: 0scarS

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Easy to use and the mop heads are full and absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Dfav4d1

customer_reviews.title: Handy mop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Handy for spills and tracked in wet dog feet.
customer_reviews.author: mjdelaware

customer_reviews.title: Great strong Mop
customer_reviews.text: Bought for attendant request new mop Seems very happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Razzi

product_meta.title: Libman Tornado Plus Refills Kit – Twist Hardwood, Vinyl, Tile, and More. Easy Wringing Technology, Super Absorbent Machine Washable. Mop and 3 Replacement Heads, Green White
product_meta.description: Mop up messes on any hard surfaces! The Tornado Mop kit is best for all messes, but particularly heavier ones in the kitchen, bathroom or any room with a hard floor surface. The Tornado Mop has a grip n' click ratchet that wrings more water and its easy-to-change mop head is machine washable and reusable. The 3 green bands prevent tangling and the larger mop head covers 50 percent more surface area, cutting down your mopping time. The polyester yarn resists odor causing bacteria. Three refill mop heads are included.
feature_bullets: USE ON VARIETY OF FLOORS: The Libman Tornado Mop can be used on Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate, Ceramic, Marble, Stone, and more!
ABSORBENT MOP HEAD: Clean up tough messes with the Libman Tornado Mop. The replaceable mop head gives you maximum absorbency to soak and mop away the toughest messes.
EASY WRINGING: The Grip N’ Twist technology lets you wring out excess water with ease for effective cleaning.
DURABLE: Libman’s Tornado Mop has a powder-coated steel handle and strong plastic molded parts. The mop head is made from high quality materials and is machine-washable.
REFILLS INCLUDED: This kit comes with 3 Tornado Mop polyester/yarn replacement heads.
